org.opendaylight.controller.forwardingrulesmanager

Interface PortGroupChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardingRulesManager

    public interface PortGroupChangeListener
    PortGroupChangeListener listens to the PortGroup updates provided by the PortGroupProvider.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void portGroupChanged(PortGroupConfig config, java.util.Map<Node,PortGroup> portGroupData, boolean add)
      This method is invoked by PortGroupProvider whenever it detects a change in PortGroup membership for a given PortGroupConfig.

    • Method Detail

      • portGroupChanged

        void portGroupChanged(PortGroupConfig config,
                    java.util.Map<Node,PortGroup> portGroupData,
                    boolean add)
        This method is invoked by PortGroupProvider whenever it detects a change in PortGroup membership for a given PortGroupConfig.
        Parameters:
        config - Port Group Configuration
        portGroupData - HashMap of Node id to PortGroup that represents the updated ports as detected by PortGroupProvider.
        add - true indicates that the PortGroup is added. False indicates that the PortGroup is removed.
